comments.comment: I just finished watching the video and opened insta to see the saddest news of Maya passing away. And Felix going through photos of Maya in this video just made it even sadder… Marzia, Felix, I am so sorry for your loss.
My Deepest Condolences for Maya. We're all here for both you and Marzia. Please take your time to grief, Felix. We will always be here with you, every step of the way.
Rest in peace Maya... I'm sorry for your loss Felix and Marzia

Rest in Peace, Maya.
She was loved by the entire fanbase, Felix and Marzia for many, many years. We'll miss her
Pewds finally seems so at peace, it’s kinda sad to see but we’ve prolly reached the last arc boys
I’ve never seen a more complete case of character progression, kudos Felix, we will always support you with every one of your ventures
Pewds hitting us with a brofist gets me everytime.
Rest in peace Maya, you will be remembered as an amazing pug. My deepest condolences go out to Felix and Marzia
Growing up with you pewds seeing you so happy and at peace with your wife is honestly something I’d never be mad at.. it makes me happy seeing you happy! With or without YouTube!
Man this hits harder after the latest news. Sorry for your loss Felix and Marzia. Rest in peace little Maya. You will be missed.
PewDiePie deleting his own Subreddit is one of the most surreal things ever, considering the fact that how chaotically hilarious that Subreddit is.

The one time I open Instagram I am saddened to learn of the passing of Maya, one of the greats. 17 years is amazing, thank you Felix and Marzia for loving her and making the best of her life, as she have done for you. It may be in the past now, but grateful to share in your joy and sorrow. Take care ya'll
My heart breaks for you. I’m sorry man.

Yesterday, I watched this wholesome video of Pewds looking at photos of Maya at 7:46 and I didn't expect I will be hearing some bad news so suddenly from subreddit today. Rest in peace, Maya. We will miss you
Im so sorry for your loss pewds. I know how hard this is. You are an amazing dad, she couldn’t have asked for a better one

Maya deserved to live forever in good health. I'm happy she had such loving parents who cared so much for her, it was possible for her to live a long life. Thank you, for loving Maya and Edgar and all of your pets, so much. Rest In Paradise, Maya. ️
it was just yesterday he looked at the pictures of maya and awwed, couldn’t think of a love more pure than this. Rest in peace maya

man it’s wild seeing a youtuber i literally grow up watching slowly phase out of youtube
it’s one of those things you know will eventually happen but never really are ready for when it does come around. it’s always a surprise

Edit: I meant retired as in deciding not to post at all anymore.
I know it's selfish, but I hope that when he retires he still uploads a short hello video once every few months. I've been a fan since I think 2014. I really don't want this to end

I’m so sorry about Maya Pewds, the news absolutely broke me – that little girl had the biggest heart and put smiles on millions of faces. I hope you can come out stronger pewdie, thinking of you Maya  Rest in Peace sweet girl

Came here to send my condolences Pewds. Maya was an amazing part of your videos and to have her gone will make a massive difference. We love you Pewds and if you need time off to deal with your loss then take all the time you need, you'll have your army waiting for the moment you return.
RIP Maya man... I been watching you for so long since you were in sweden in the apartment with maya and giving her all the love a dog deserves. I'll miss her :(

My heart breaks for you and Marzia May Maya Rest In Peace I hope you take a break from social media and give yourself the time you need to heal️‍ Been watching you for 10 years now and will never forget the impact you’ve had in my life🫶 Love u forever Pewds

Rest in peace Maya. She was everyone's childhood dog, and we all know she had a wonderful life w Felix and Marzia ️




They call her jabba the Hutt for a reasonnnnn ️

I remember so many years ago all those Fridays with Pewdiepies featuring Maya, and every wonderful memory since then. She was an amazing dog and it was a pleasure to learn and grow with her. I am so so sorry for your loss, Marzia and Felix. We’ll miss you, Maya. My dog will be waiting for you on the rainbow bridge

I’m happy for Pews finding peace and living life for himself, as he should. But man, it’ll be rough when I look back on his channel and see his last posted vid being a few years ago. I want to be selfish and hope he uploads forever, but we all must move on at some point. Been watching since 7th grade, and now I graduate college next semester :). Love you pewds, and bros. Thanks for all the memories.
1:49 I love how PewDiePie took a minute to fully realize that Markiplier has an actual OnlyFans, it's almost like he knew this was going to happen sooner or later.
Deepest condolences to you Felix and Mariza. Maya was blessing to you both as well as Edgar. She will be missed and she's in a good place. Rest in Peace Maya :(

He’s slowly letting us go so it’s not so much on many of us.

We’ve had him around for so long that he really does hold a big place in a lot of our hearts.

He’s doing the 1 thing that many do not…

Massive respect x 

I remember how cut I was when you just got rid of “bro fist”

It's crazy to think it's been over 10 years, and some great year's it has been from barrels to Tseries, I'm glad to have been part of the bro army for so long and I'm glad he is satisfied where he is after giving us years of entertainment.

My condolences for Maya. She lived a long and happy life. She was happy with both of you. May she rest in peace.

Take all the time you and Marzia need.
Rip

7:45  feels more painful after seeing their instagram post  you weren’t my dog maya but i loved you in every moment your were in pewd’s and marzia’s videos, your were always so corky & cute and i loved how marzia & pewds cared so much for you. We’ll truly miss you maya ️

.. i hope edgar is okay :’((
it feels like an end of an era is coming upon us and im not ready
7:36 hit so different now uughhhhh.
Rest in Peace little Maya. You will always be remembered online and will always live on in our hearts.

7:45 now we know 
Rip maya forever the best pug!!

SEEING MAYA MADE ME CRY. 

r.i.p Maya, your human servants did you so damn well <3
It’s ok Felix,it had to be done and you did what you must.

My condolences for Maya, she was the greatest pug . I wish you, Marzia and Edgar much love and peace right now. And while now is hard to see, all will be alright eventually, and just all the happy memories you provided to her will stay

I'm so sorry for loss Pewds :( Maya was such a beautiful and strong dog and she was part of my childhood and I'm an adult now, seeing her go after 17 years absolutely shattered me but I know for sure she lived the best life she could have ever asked for. Farewell and welcome to pug paradise

I'm reading the comments before watching the video.. I feel like crying already.. I love u pewds.. and I love u guys we are a big family. Can't believe it's been 12 years since I started watching pewds.. so much respect for this man. Thank u for keeping me company in my darkest days
I came here to give my condolences to maya, it is absolutely remarkable she was alive and with us for 17 years, it should’ve been more but the fact she was around is amazing, may god rest her soul
Rip Maya, My Deepest Condolences go out to you and Marzia, Take as much time as you, we will be here for you. Maya is in a better place.
R.I.P Pewdiepie'a subreddit you will be missed but you will never be forgotten you will live on in our hearts forever
Artists aren't annoyed with A.I. cuz it's "replacing" them it's because their art is literally being plagiarised by the A.I. taking it without permission and using it as a dataset

Felix has always been a stone, a wall, a boulder. 
They're always there - and are a good place to take a break, spend time leaning on, feel like everything is bearable.
You're really loved Felix. You're amazing. Thankyou for being my boulder.
You're a nice boulder.
I need a full video of pewds just looking at old pictures of maya and edgar and repeatedly going “aww…they look so different” over and over again
This video made me realise how much I love these reddit videos

I don't think we've seen the last arc of PewDiePie...I believe there will be a renaissance in the next two years where he decides to play a game and we get one more great series. I think he's really just finally taking time to enjoy the wealth and empire he has built for himself. He'll be back.

I just found out about maya and I'm currently bawling my eyes out.. Im so so sorry for your loss felix, I've been watching you since the beginning, it may sound odd but I loved maya so so much, when my dogs passed away it was your videos that could help me find a safe place, maya was such a precious dog, I will always remember her, much love ️
Pewds reacting like that to maya's photos breaks my heart when I opened Instagram this morning. Rip Maya

Maya was a very fun dog. I remember seeing her grow, and now, it has all come to an end. I know you won't forget her, and we won't either. I'm sorry for your loss, and I hope you persevere. Keep being the great people you and Marzia are. Stay strong.
man, i rarely even watch pewds anymore but i’m devastated to hear of the loss of his sub. it was way too funny and got me through some stuff lol.

RIP Maya, she will truly be missed. I'll always remember when the jabba the hut song came out and I would listen to it all the time as a teenager in school. Hope you and Marzia are taking care of yourselves and giving eggy lots of cuddles <3
I lived in that subreddit I am homeless now hope you are happy
This end of an era is really impacting me emotionally holy fuck. Wtf. Who knew man. I've been watching since 2011, I just don't think I'm ready to let go of it all tbh. ️ Love you bro.
I've missed LWIAY glad to see it's back. Can't wait for the next one in 2024!!!
I'm so sorry to hear about Maya, Felix you really did give her an amazing life.

Sending my condolences for maya, I know it's not easy to get through it when one of your lovely pets passed away but stay strong marzia and felix! Maya will always be with our memories. She was so lucky to had you both.
Condolence for Maya bro. Be happy that your pet lived a long, happy life.
Its so sad watching this video after reading the news about Maya, she lived the best life a dog could hope for thanks to you and Marzia
Sorry to hear about Maya. Take all the time you need, its always hard to lose someone so close

These videos are cool. 

Just like catching up with a good friend every now and then, who has moved away but still takes the time to contact you to say hello

A true friend indeed
rest in peace maya
PewDiePie isn't just a phase, it's a litestyle. A gemer, a news presenter, a gym bro, a philosopher basically an older brother we 've never met but because a significant part of our lives.
I'm so sorry about Maya. That pug was a huge spot of joy on this channel..
7:40 This moment feels so different in just a single day

I'm crying so much right now for Maya. My sister sent me the news and I burrsted into tears. We grew up with Maya man we share your pain you're not alone. I lost my baby (I got her in kindergarten and lost her after I graduated in highschool) and her son who was born when I was in first grade. It hurts so much but you gotta stay strong for them. We gave them the best life ever. You and Marzia did. Love you guys stay strong. Love you Maya. Love you Edgar. ️️️️️️️
Rest in piece, Maya

I am so so sorry for Maya 
I know she was old, I know she lived a long happy life, and I know it was longer than some other dogs get, but I still know how much it hurts... Hope you guys and Edgar are okay, and I hope you bring comfort to one another  she will be dearly missed by so many people...
5:57 that one hurt ngl
Rest in Peace Maya.. <3
Rest in piece Maya, I didn’t grow up with just pewds but with that sweet girl as well. I’ll miss her greatly  I’m so sorry for your loss
I’m crying because Maya was apart of my childhood with the song Jabba The Hut. Rest in peace sweet girl
it’s been a long time! great to connect as a community once again :))

My heart goes out to you and Marzia for the loss of the adorable and precious pup. Maya has a special place in all of our hearts. Take as long as you need and grieve. We will be with you in thought and prayer.
Deepest Condolences. You guys need to take your time to heal.

I havent heard of the news until now and I want to send my condolences to you guys and i hope you are doing well after maya passing. Just know we are all here for you both

Rest in peace Maya
we're all gonna blink and then this channel will be frozen and he'll just have his own kids running around and he'll just be happy and i hope we all will be too..
Maya was my absolute favorite. I’m so sorry for your loss Pewds and Marzia

PewDiePie after being robbed: I'm going to be less materialist, I don't need things

PewDiePie after seeing flashy butterfly knife: 3:22
Rest in peace mayachan  im so happy she had a long happy life - the length doesn’t minimise the loss though. Take the time you and Marzia need and hold Edgar close. Maya was such a special dog
Sad sad sad day for us all, too, Pewds. Sorry about the loss of Maya. She has been dear to us as well. Praying that our support can give you, Marzia and Edgar the strength through this rough moment-
Every brofist brings me back to the old days of Amnesia and Happy Wheels. I'm so happy to see you living the good life and settling down, you deserve it.
We appreciate Felix’s comeback. He never fails to make us all laugh despite the challenges we face in our lives.
Crying rn , please stay strong we love you maya  rest in doggy heaven
R.I.P Maya, she light our lives for the last 10 years. May she rest and enjoy the heaven.
It’s like my dad just returned with the milk after all these years.

R.I.P. Maya its sad to see her gone after having watched you for 10+ years even tho i haven’t been watching consistently the past few years because of work and trying to get a degree. I am very grateful for all those childhood memories it was the highlight of my teens.
Been seeing Maya ever since i started watching your videos 8 years ago, May she Rest in eternal peace...
Sorry for your loss Felix and Marzia. Rest in peace little Maya. You will be missed.
You don't have to believe me but I haven't missed a single video since 2014. Greatest character development I've ever followed along with. So happy for your success. HUGE PP!
Rest in peace Maya, deepest condolences for you and Marzia.
Rest in paradise Maya, you are loved by so many! Genuinely sad about poor girl. She lived a long, full life worth celebrating.
Lets all take a moment to appreciate the hard work Pewdiepie has done for us throughout our childhood
Sorry for your lost, Felix. Rest in peace Maya
After everything he's gone through. He's our favorite Sweed.
i just watched this video after hearing the unfortunate news about maya and that part with her just hit harder...
I love how he didn't question it any further when he found out Mark has an onlyfans
pewdiepie has had so many phases on YouTube, and one of my favourites was his insane personality in getting over it
Rip Maya You will be remembered
Rest In Peace Maya. I hope Pewds will take this well. Ill miss her so much. She'll always be our beautiful dog, our Jabba the Hutt
Rest in peace, Maya. We all love you

Maya definitely lived her best life she loved you guys and was definitely happy I appreciate the smiles and laughs she brought with her presence freinds come and go but our fur babies live in our hearts

I’m sorry papa  it has been over 10 years of growing up with you and seeing you grow as a person and start a family…. Maya was loved and cared for and you were the sweetest and kindest to her. Thank you for sharing your life and your memories with us. It means a lot pewds. No matter where things go moving forward just know this. You were and always will be the best
R.I.P to Maya the pug️ we will miss her so much I have so many fond memories of seeing her in older videos and I’m sure a lot of others do as well  fly high maya
Condolences for maya.

I always dreaded the day would come when we’d hear about Maya passing. I remember watching the video of when he first got her and Edgar’s reaction to her as well. she lived long, she lived happy and she lived loved. So so heartbroken for your loss, Felix. I really hope you take your time and don’t feel pressured to come back before it’s time. just know she’s resting in peace now.  much love.
Rest in peace Maya... I'm sorry for your loss Felix
That subreddit was like father to me. I loved it like a son

I remember all the nights I pull out my tablet and watch your videos after a whole day of every flavored abuse. This channel is home to me for 11 years, and it will continue to bring me peace no matter what insane or chill video you put out. Even if after you retire from youtube completely this will still be my home Thanks for the crazy shit man
Rest in peace Maya, I've been watching  Pewds since i  was a kid and you were my absolute fav dog :( Im so sorry for your loss Felix and Marzia.

I am so sorry to hear about maya.  She was so loved by you and marzia, not to mention all of your followers.  I lost my cat unexpectedly last year and it hit me pretty hard.  Sending you both love during this challenging time.
Rest in peace Maya   we’ll wait however long you want Felix okie so don’t hesitate to take time to grieve
Maya, you meant a lot to so many everywhere. I am also sure that you meant infinitely more to the people who spent their life with you and wish you rest.
I hope you and Marzia can heal well with time. Maya was a wonderful dog who gave joy to all of the millions of people who got to see her. What a big life full of love for such a small dog.
I'm sorry for your loss Felix. I hope that you remember Maya fondly and that the pain fades. Life goes on and pets pass away. So it goes.
